text: - [Narrator] AWS Data Exchange
gives customers a one stop shop

to find, subscribe to,
and use third party data
in the cloud.

This fully managed service
offers secure, transparent,

and consolidated access
to cross domain data
that can be used to drive decision making
across your technology business,
including marketing and audience data,
customer sentiment data, web traffic data,
and location data.
You can use data from AWS Data Exchange
to better understand your customers
improve your customer experience,
gain insight into your competition,
and identify growth opportunities.
Once subscribed to a data product,
you can analyze it with a wide variety

of AWS analytics and
machine learning services.

Numerous data providers
offer a variety of trials,

so you can evaluate the
data before you buy.

You will also find hundreds
of free public data sources
to support your analysis.
Get started today.
(upbeat music)
